{"draw":0,"recordsTotal":188,"recordsFiltered":188,"data":[{"id":1,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198199662405 (ExtremAdn)","alts":null,"description":"[b]Type of appeal[/b] [i]SteamRep tag removal/downgrade[/i] [b]What was your in-game name when you got banned?[/b] [i]ExtremAdn[/i] [b]When did it happen?[/b] [i]300~ days[/i] [b]What's the specified reason?[/b] [i]I added a user (advicebanana) to buy his knife and I try to scam him with midleman metod coping his friend profile with my second acound ([url]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198142325808/[/url]) trying to trade me her knife.  Here the link to the report: [url=http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/8389-76561198199662405-extremadn-76561198142325808-antim.html]76561198199662405 (ExtremAdn), 76561198142325808 (antim)[/url][/i] [b]Why do you think you should be unbanned?[/b] [i]First that i need to say is sorry,  I would also like to apologize for my bad English. There have been almost 300 days since it happened, at that time I was very resentful because I had spent my pay of one month in a AWP Hyperbeast and a guy scam me... I was stupid and in this time I could not think think of a better way to recover that weapon that scamming another user, very serious mistake from my part... I think to this day I have retrained enough and I've seen that problems are not solved causing problems for other users. I am quite sorry for what I did and I would like to return to the community with a clean image. After the death of my grandmother I see things differently, very differently.. I hope you will forgive me and my sincerest apologies to the user "advicebanana" for what I try to do that day. I can assure you that I have changed, I know that all mod here listen that all the days but Its true... Again, Im sorry for my acts. I am still ashamed to this very day. [u]Questions of [/u][/i][u][b][url=http://forums.f-o-g.eu/members/tio-jose-das-vacas.html]Tio José das Vacas[/url] [/b]of last post:[/u] [b]My alt acounds:[/b] 1.- [i][url]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198142325808/[/url] 2.- [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198250988412]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/[/url][/i][url=https://steamid.io/lookup/76561198250988412]76561198250988412[/url] [b]How many people have you tried to scam?[/b] I dont remenber exactly but I add like 5-6  [b]How many people have you impersonated with your alt?[/b] I think like 3-4 (I dont know exactly) [b]Have you ever been successful at scamming? If yes, how many time and how many people.[/b] No, fortunately [b]Why is your alt with the name "FREE Coins!!! CODE: TAKECOINS"?[/b] That my code of a gambing site "CSGOPolygon" and use it to win some skins without adversely affecting other users in the steam comunity. [i]Best Regards, Ander Duro (ExtremAdn)​[/i]  ","evidence":"There is no evidence this is a change of hearth. Random ScreenShot (https://files.f-o-g.eu/ad0f39f072ad34gf3fd11a9e870db8a0)","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":627,"locked":1,"creator_id":19,"modificator_id":19,"created_at":"25.07.2016 20:43:14","updated_at":"2016-07-30 00:40:10","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":6,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198179679353 (K3ro)","alts":null,"description":"Well,I tried this method named middleman scam with one of my friends after both of us were scammed,we tried like three or four times with fail as a result,so I abandoned it and restarted trading,when I saw that I couldn't use tf2.wh anymore,that because my name history was still there and I got reported on FoG and I admit that I impersonated the middleman I7|JING,abusing his profile and nickname. I want to get unbanned only to restart trading,since I have around 50000-60000 points remaining from my last trades on tf2.wh. I got banned 95 days ago on [i]11.05.2016 My appeal on the last forum:   http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/12240-steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-k3ro.html[/i]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":749,"locked":1,"creator_id":42,"modificator_id":42,"created_at":"14.08.2016 10:18:11","updated_at":"2016-08-26 21:08:51","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":7,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198219157875 (dank memay)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I'm truly sorry and I admint I did try and scam but I've never scammed anyone. I can show all the proof if needed I got scammed twice and I recently bought a Butterfly Knife | Stained. I then wanted more, but ended up in this current state :/. I felt kind of crappy while doing it and thankfully never scammed anyone. I now just got scammed again and have learned a lesson. I apologize for trying to scam and would really like to be unbanned. Why should we consider unbanning you?: I only wanted more money and me being dumb and young I only saw one way, to scam.. And now that I've seen what can happend I feel crappy and never want to do it again. What have you changed since then?: Well first to not try and scam and claim that I have a vault.. Do you have any alt accounts?: Yes, this and another one that's listed on steamrep. How many people you tried to scam?: Around 15. Have you ever been successful in scamming?: Nope.[/i]","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/7g4gb3f1d42gcg0g453a2fc26580db5c https://files.f-o-g.eu/88b73547dgf4a96d0fbf9cad3gcdaa61 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":359,"locked":1,"creator_id":45,"modificator_id":45,"created_at":"15.08.2016 15:43:13","updated_at":"2016-08-23 23:38:49","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

I see the evidence and I understand that it is all stacked against me, so, Ireally dont careabout whatever server or anything I was banned on, but Ii care about having a steamrep scammer tag. so I dont know howto contact the person who reported this, so if any admins could help me out so I can pay what I owe, which I guess was 1 key and 15 ref, and then could Ii please get this tag removed? thanks, and hopefully thanks for the help!","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":423,"locked":1,"creator_id":52,"modificator_id":52,"created_at":"19.08.2016 07:07:56","updated_at":"2016-08-24 18:27:37","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":11,"type":"Friend/Family - My account was abused by a family member or friend","appellant":"76561198165312621 (Byali)","alts":null,"description":"I haven't had access to my account in over a month as I have been gone on vacation with my family in Mexico, I gave my cousin access to my account because he wanted to play some of my games and because I had nice csgo skins he like to use them, I had no control over what happened to my account or what he did on my account, please look this over and consider lifting the ban because I would like to be able to trade with no problems regarding my steamrep status over something I had no control of. I don't know how to prove this, the only way is to show proof of my travel history which includes private information that I don't feel comfortable sharing on the internet, please consider this as it was not me who has access to my account at the time of the incident I was banned for","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":63,"locked":1,"creator_id":54,"modificator_id":54,"created_at":"21.08.2016 05:27:44","updated_at":"2016-08-21 22:43:55","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":14,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198144171296 (Dimitri)","alts":null,"description":"[i]It was 1 Year ago, I just found out about csgo gambling when i thought why not try my luck, and I was extremly lucky, won alot of money, so I went on this site called csgoshuffle back in the day, and after winning a pot I falsely accepted an offer which ended up beeing an offer for my Items instead of the items I won, I was really upset about this considering it was around 500$, and I got to upset I tried to do it myself which was a terrible mistake, It didnt end up working either, I tried for like 1 hour and never did it again, and I am really truly sorry I tried to scam anyone, I was just really upset and I never tried scamming since[/i]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":400,"locked":1,"creator_id":70,"modificator_id":70,"created_at":"28.08.2016 16:51:56","updated_at":"2016-08-28 17:30:59","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":17,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198089757674 (Barney#CASHED OUT)","alts":null,"description":" I have been reported for intent to scam [url]https://f-o-g.trade/reports/158[/url]. i had no intention to scam anyone i did it because one of guy named harley quinns requested me to do as i was banned by admin edward in cash rep group.the guy named harly quinns added me and requested me to do because he told me that admin is banning everyone wantedly this guy took my weakness as my advantage since i was bit stressed and tensed i changed my name and did as he told.i am here to provied any evidence and proof you request.i am ashamed of myself sir and to prove i have changed i will be donating funds to various websites like FoG,Steamrep,Reddit and so on.ill try to be part of these communities to make this place better.and ill even assure if anyone come against me with the proof that i scammed them ill refund their items/paypal.give me a chance to prove me that i have changed and you will not regret it.i hope the result will be in my favour regards, ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":678,"locked":1,"creator_id":68,"modificator_id":68,"created_at":"29.08.2016 14:04:51","updated_at":"2016-08-31 18:45:50","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":27,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198170421719 (Zenith)","alts":null,"description":"It's been 250 days since my last incident with scammers and I first want to say how truly sorry I am for assisting a scammer with tf2 gambling. Ever since I got the caution tag, I've eliminated myself from all gambling websites (even CSGO) and unfriended anyone involved with the situation that I had dealt with in the past. I promise not to do this act of curelty ever again. I noticed about 20 days ago that the link to my report has been so old that I can't access the link to the report and it has been archived. I was wondering if this meant that my Caution tag can be appealed or not in a sense that it will be accepted since the report was archived and no longer accesible. Evidence of the link not working and the report possibly being archived down below.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/c6ad7g2ba6c79d3a39a0554266ef6c7f https://files.f-o-g.eu/a4c046347gd0ab787affe2c0fdf59765 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":626,"locked":1,"creator_id":98,"modificator_id":98,"created_at":"14.09.2016 21:15:02","updated_at":"2016-10-06 21:45:39","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

I lost, and I ran shortly after. I have repaid @Killer , and I would like to have my tag downgraded, as I made a stupid mistake. I'm sorry, and I would like to learn from my mistakes in the future.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/9f46da3eaddd4feb448ccb52171d6fe8 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":243,"locked":1,"creator_id":119,"modificator_id":119,"created_at":"30.09.2016 20:58:05","updated_at":"2016-10-04 22:00:36","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

Trying to scam was a dumb decission of me, but i changed my mind. Down below i linked some Screenshots of some trades ive made. If you want i can link Profiles of all the other traders. I hope you can understand my situation best regards, Lubor","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/f1gafg117d70a9b733bfe846gf814b5e https://files.f-o-g.eu/fb4ga2555f59d451abee068dca9ag25g ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":439,"locked":1,"creator_id":126,"modificator_id":126,"created_at":"08.10.2016 14:33:58","updated_at":"2016-10-10 15:49:41","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":51,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198064131373 (✪ nTK | smurfin?)","alts":null,"description":"Hello, today i wrote this appeal to have a chance at redeeming myself for the mistake i made many years ago. First of all, i'm sorry for my foolish act that got me banned on tf2outpost.com and marked as a scammer on steamrep. I was about 10~ 11 years old when the incident took place (i was born in 2001). Many years has gone passed, i realised how dumb i was and i regret it immidiately. Since then, i was a legit and fair trader but i gamble it all away =P. Recently my friends keep mocking me about the ban on steamrep. It make me really sad and annoyed. I post this appeal so maybe i could have another chance of becoming a good part of the trading community. I promise to both myself and to you guys to never ever act foolishly and get reported ever again. Best Regard.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":240,"locked":1,"creator_id":146,"modificator_id":146,"created_at":"23.10.2016 08:11:00","updated_at":"2016-10-23 12:04:57","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":54,"type":"Fake - Report had falsified evidence","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"I have been reported for the wrong reason. I have been a good guy, and I have had steam for 2+ years now! I was goofing off and said to my friend, "Hey, you think I shou'd pretend to scam you for a vid?" and of course he said, "Yes it will make some good views!" Of course I did this and made the vid however... after this not changing my profile I indeed asked some guy to trade. This and seeing my fake account made him suspicious and report me. Now, I was trading him legit so I really don't know why he would report me. I asked him if he would trade his high-teir karambit doppler for my items. This is false evidence, or in my case I think it is. You can see my profile is back to normal... and never will be like that again!","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/26421f7b3e4g0d8dag8cddd277f79g7g","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":334,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"25.10.2016 03:05:14","updated_at":"2016-10-27 19:11:50","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

I Have Steamrep Report & Ban on my account , it is fake becouse my account was hacked , i return my account , and when i do it . what i see i have steamrep ban. i can show you steam support message what mens i am not scammer and my account was really hacked! i back my hacked account a couple weeks ago , please help me !","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/g5460a8a2c4de63af1b9gc1cd3096552 http://files.f-o-g.eu/bf28ff4c9856cb8cgefb55b9e2d4970g http://files.f-o-g.eu/199eadbe21561cca8d2bc72d031bc493 http://files.f-o-g.eu/6501d01ca8ecf83d08fdg9acgb36dg6f http://files.f-o-g.eu/47ec7e6g3b88b12e6fegd2efcff4c062","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":162,"locked":1,"creator_id":153,"modificator_id":153,"created_at":"25.10.2016 16:09:32","updated_at":"2016-11-09 13:43:50","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":57,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198057116992 (Dr. Sister Fister)","alts":null,"description":"Good evening, or whatever you have right now. I have tried to sign on Survivors Rest earlier today and it said that I am banned from trading, I was like WHAT, it said that I might have been banned on SteamRep, but I did not even know what that site even was. So I checked there, and I saw that my account was banned, Looking at the screenshots of the proof that was linked to my account, I have realized that it was a year ago when a friend of mine used my account and tried scamming from my account, which he did not even tell me about. I know it might sound like a lie, and that even if you believe into my story it is still my responsibility. I shouldnt have let anybody use my account and I regret letting him do it since he got me banned. I have never scammed and never will because it is a really scammy thing to do. And also, the accounts that are considered "Alts" on my profile are unknown to me. Only 2 accs that I can understand, 1 of them being an account that  was owned by one of my friends and was hacked long time ago and forgotten for ages already ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198022439322]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198022439322)[/url] and his new account right now is    (http://steamcommunity.com/id/lintersgonnaplay). All of the other linked account are not my accounts and are not know to me. All and all, I take the responsibility for my friend trying to scam from my account and I promise to never make the same mistake and to never scam people myself. I will completely understand if you Deni this appeal since it is my fault for letting people do such things hiding behind my personallity P.S. Currently Me and Only me have access to my account and it has been that way for about a year now ( probably week or two after a friend has attempted a scam because he had access to it for about 10 days as long as i can remember). Actually i didnt expect him to do something like this, and i didnt expect that he will basically ruin this account VAC ban, and community ban, when i found this out i was pretty surprised and mad. I asked this guy if he scammed anyone and if he played with cheats, and he said like he never scammed anyone and he was only playing with skinchanger. Anyway i could try to get my account back from him, also i have original email of this account so i could just restore it if he refuse to give it back. Why someone decided that this is my account? "},{"id":113,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198208771629 (✪ MiDK)","alts":null,"description":"My reason is set as 'change of heart' but it is a little bit different. Please read below.  For more evidence, check my recent appeal thread - https://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-rhythm1c-yt.11524/ I could provide my trade history if needed. I have not attempted a "trade scam" since March. I've decided to go clean.  I posted this on FOG and here's my description- [i]Hi, this is Rhythm1C. I was banned on, I believe, March 27th, 2016. The reason was attempting a trade offer scam. If whoever reviews this doesn't know what happened, I sent a bunch of people with an offer for their 5 keys with nothing in return saying it was from my birthday raffle. I was immature and stupid back then and my actions can be described in one word- retarded.  I was bitter because I'd lost a big bet while gambling, and a little scared too- I realized I'd lost most of my inventory and wanted to make my inventory back on TF2... I then remembered my YouTube channel "Rhythm1C" and decided to upload a video -my second TF2 video. Id made a lot of money off YouTube so I thought I could make some of I made another video. I got around to recording top 5 scams to watch out for- I was then making the video in haste (I was, an am still a very impatient person) and didn't think anything through. I sent a bunch of people the trade offer scam and was preparing the next, the unusual quick switch when I got a notification that I was banned. I realized how stupid I was after I read my ban appeal. I felt pathetic. Why had I not thought to ask a friend instead? I'm not sure. Also, being completely honest, I would have given the keys back. I was bracing that if they accepted the fake trade offer, I'd give them back the keys while recording and upload it to my channel.  Please understand- I wanted to create an image of me being authentic and a "gentleman"- so I'd have better reputation when doing steam wallet trades, for example. I had no trouble with this ban after the rejection of my former appeal but since I'm broke again on CS:GO this time, I've decided to start trading, NOT do stupid, potentially ban-able things. Therefore, I plea to remove my ban down to a warning, maybe. I want to have the warning there to make sure I don't do stupid things again. I hope you understand my situation. I am young and feel like I'll make mistakes in the future. I'll need the community to help me out. (I'm 13.) I hope you guys can give me a second chance.  Thanks, Rhythm1C P.S. my name was rhythm1c when I got banned, but I currently use he name "MidKnight".[/i]​ [url]http://files.f-o-g.eu/a534e29eab4df9c4fbe3b9g598fe07de[/url]  this was an example of a trade offer I'd sent. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq7_9wHRAF5h2wCYdrSOykw this is my youtube channel.
